Text:
One of the best music shows
Video quality is VHS like, but sound in DTS channel is great, also have PCM audio channel encoded

There has been some restoration work done on the video, but it not brilliant. That is the reason for just the 720P rip. Otherwise I would have uploaded 1080P version.

The sound is top notch. I love Dire Straits. This is the only BDrip on Piratebay.
thanks for your efforts, looking forward to watching this as ive never see it in 720p
